content: After fighting for a bit, Yellowbrow will often vanish into thin air, but you can get a heads up on where he's going by looking for his shadow on the ground and which direction it darts off to.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow'.
The content is as follows:
After fighting for a bit, Yellowbrow will often vanish into thin air, but you can get a heads up on where he's going by looking for his shadow on the ground and which direction it darts off to.
